home.heroSubHeading: Welcome to DagadArt an immersive canvas where the synergy of art and technology paints a vibrant tapestry
home.joinUsHeadOne: Join us in exploring the convergence of artistry and engineering, where each creation embodies the sprit of our times.
home.joinUsHeadTwoTxt: Our journey commenced in October 1991 when our main sculptures and originator embarked on a creative odyssey in tombstone renovation and sculpting.
home.joinHeadTwoSubtxt: Pioneering innovation, we introduced our first individual tombstone in poland in 1994,proving the idea of our craftsmanship.
home.JonSubtxtTwo: ADVANCED PROTOTYPING AND MANUFACTURING: INTEGRATING ARTISTRY WITH 3D PRINTING AND SCANNING
home.careerSmtxtTwo: STONE, RAW MATERIAL SUPPLIERS, MANUFACTURING COOPERATION
home.careerSmtxtThree: STUDIO SUBLETTING, MANUFACTURING OF YOUR PROJECTS

globalMapsubTxt.globalMapsubTxt1: We are Present in the Czech Republic (cesky tesin and Prague), Poland (Bielsko-Biala), and India (Pune).
globalMapsubTxt.globalMapsubTxt2: Wherever you are, DagadArt is Ready to Foreg Connections and Explore the Endless Possiblities of Artistic Collaboration and Innovation, Contact Us to Bring Your Creative Vision to Life

home.FooterTxt: Embark on a Collaborative Journey with DagadArt
